body: And her personality too, she became more confident and cheerful. More male characters should try to have that kind of growth.

minminazusa
Thanks...
We all know what she Changed is only her Appearance and Nothing else.. 👍

Takashi got a friend, Mari, who moved away to the city 3 years ago. Back then, she doesn't leave much impression, yet he somehow felt things get boring after she left. When she came back to the village for summer, Mari has changed her style, and it made him uneasy because of how much different she was from his memories. He told her, he doesn't like gal. She teased him and they have sex, but it always disturb him from thinking how she has became a slut who have sex for fun, not like the girl in his memory. When confronted, she told him she never do it with anyone else. In a new place, she tried to change her image because she once asked Takashi what kind of girl he likes, and he answered a bright and cheerful girl. Also, he only dislike gal because his image of them are sluts. | Always envious of how much girls can throw everything to change themselves. Boys always seems to hesitate and give up, rather than trying to change themselves for the girl they like.
